title: Creative Biolabs Offers Scholarship Worth $1,000 to College Students
title_html: Creative Biolabs Offers Scholarship Worth $1,000 to College Students

source.description:
New York, US–May 15, 2019 Creative Biolabs, a company located in New York, recently launched it 2019 Scholarship Program. For students majoring in chemistry or biology at an accredited college or university, 3.0 GPA or more makes them eligible for this opportunity. The Scholarship can be applied until June 15, 2019. Its winner, who will be announced on August 1, 2019, will be awarded $1,000.
As a leader in
antibody manufacturing
and engineering, Creative Biolabs has been helping young talents with their development in the chemical or biological field. In 2016, the company started to launch an annual scholarship program to subsidize them. As long as they have won a minimum of 3.0 GPA, students who major in a science related field such as Biology, Chemistry, and Molecular Biology at an accredited college or university are eligible to apply for this
Scholarship
.
“Creative Biolabs Selection Committee is responsible for selecting the final winner of this Scholarship, in a completely just and fair manner. The selection is based on three criteria. In terms of academic performance, besides GPA, a detailed learning plan is also an important factor. In addition, we prefer the applicants who are good influences and leaders both in and out of school. And it will be perfect if the applicant has participated in some voluntary activities, community services or any other public service activities,” said the President of Creative Biolabs Selection Committee.
“To apply for this Scholarship, the applicants need to submit the related documents online twice. By June 15, they must fill out the online
scholarship application form
. They are supposed to select one of the six topics in the form, and compose an essay of 800-1,000 words based on the topic they have chosen. The committee will review these essays and select six best writers to submit new documents. The six writers need select one of the other five topics, and before July 20, submit a PPT of 10-12 pages or a video for at least five minutes about the topic they choose. The quality of their work will determine weather they can get the scholarship.”
For college students who wish to seek their career in the biological or medical field but are frustrate by financial pressure, this is definitely a great opportunity. The whole application procedure is quite simple, and it won’t take much time for applicants to prepare the submission materials. Moreover, the application is totally free of charge from the beginning to the end. By the way, in just one month and a half from the first submission, the winner will be able to get his reward worth as much as $1,000.
About Creative Biolabs
Creative Biolabs is a leading custom service provider, with abundant experience in antibody production and engineering. Its service portfolio involves mouse and rat, human, monkey, rabbit, chicken, dog, llama and camel monoclonal antibody production. The company also conducts antibody humanization and affinity maturation. OEM services for large-scale antibody manufacturing are also available at the most competitive price in the industry.
